item.title: Dog attack, 30th June
item.description:
Attacked by a large dog this morning while running. Required GP visit and tetanus injection. I reported the attack to one of the park keepers. Was completely uninterested in helping and, importantly, was not interested in the safety of other park use
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sherrin Road, Leyton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bins locked, 30th June
item.description:
All 3 recycling bins have the lid locked, meaning recycling waste cannot be disposed inside. Bags of recycling and other rubbish has been left around, right underneath residents’ windows. Please a) unlock the bin lids and b) clear up waste left around

item.title: Cones placedon road, 30th June
item.description:

item.title: Large fridge and other small items, 30th June
item.description:

item.title: Estate cleaner needed at 1-35 Hunsdon House, 30th June
item.description:
Flat is believed to have not been cleaned for years. When the estate cleaner comes, he only cleans the ground floor. Residents on elevated floors would also like for their landings to be swept, cleared of rubbish etc. Please can the estate cleaner attend.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
